page.title: 03The Gardens Of Rufforth
page.content: Nearly all houses have a{garden.}60 of the family gardens are{open plan.} Some families don't have a{lawn.}127 {Rufforth villagers}grow flowers in their gardens,and spring bulbs was another high number (176). Not many people use an {allottment.} {Greenhouses }are owned by 39 people only,and garden sheds are owned by 58 people.Rufforth people like to grow vegetables. The most common greenhouse vegetable grown is {tomatoes.} The other vegetables that Rufforth people grow are:- { {lettuce,potatoes,carrots,cucumber {cauliflower, peas,sprouts,beans {and courgettes.} People grow their own fruit.Garden shrubs were planted by 115 garden owners.Boundaries are marked by fences mainly then {hedges {and walls.
